resources.name: Claude Code Chat
resources.description: An elegant and user-friendly Claude Code chat interface for VS Code.
resources.author: andrepimenta

resources.name: claude-code-ide.el
resources.description: claude-code-ide.el integrates Claude Code with Emacs, like Anthropicâ€™s VS Code/IntelliJ extensions. It shows ediff-based code suggestions, pulls LSP/flymake/flycheck diagnostics, and tracks buffer context. It adds an extensible MCP tool support for symbol refs/defs, project metadata, and tree-sitter AST queries.
resources.author: manzaltu

resources.name: claude-code.el
resources.description: An Emacs interface for Claude Code CLI.
resources.author: stevemolitor

resources.name: Claudix - Claude Code for VSCode
resources.description: A VSCode extension that brings Claude Code directly into your editor with interactive chat interface, session management, intelligent file operations, terminal execution, and real-time streaming responses. Built with Vue 3, TypeScript.
resources.author: Haleclipse

resources.name: crystal
resources.description: A full-fledged desktop application for orchestrating, monitoring, and interacting with Claude Code agents.
resources.author: stravu
